channel.title: CVE Feed for VillaTheme -- CURCY
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VillaTheme -- CURCY

item.title: CVE-2024-49283|2024-10-17T20:06:07.730Z -- villatheme -- curcy
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VillaTheme CURCY allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects CURCY: from n/a through 2.2.3.
